title: S15 Ep28: True Terror with Robert Englund
itunes:title: True Terror with Robert Englund
description:
Darkness Radio experiences True Terror with Robert Englund today! YES...That Robert Englund.

Nightmare on Elm Street star, Robert (Freddy) Englund joins us to discuss his new creepy Travel Channel TV series, True Terror with Robert Englund. Robert opens up with us about his thoughts on the supernatural, his Mom's ghost story, his Dad's UFO story and Robert answers listener questions.

Watch True Terror on Wednesday Nights 10pm et/9pm ct on Travel Channel.

Check out the site for more info:
https://www.travelchannel.com/shows/true-terror-with-robert-englund


Visit our shop for exciting new items, clothes, books and more: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave
